title: 1 bed 1 bath - AVAILABLE SOON!
posting_body: ['No Need to Look Further!', 'Luxury returns to Mayfield Heights!', 'Nestled in a beautiful setting overlooking the Chagrin Valley, Gates Mills Place is a beautiful and unique apartment community near Cleveland.', 'Extensive upgrades have been made to all lobbies, welcome centers, and suites.', 'Our common areas are all newly renovated and have all new lighting as well.', 'Fifteen minutes from Solon, Beachwood, Willoughby, Wickliffe...the list goes on!', 'Many amenities await you here!', 'You will enjoy garage and carport parking, sparkling indoor and outdoor pools, six fitness centers, libraries, and the on-site conveniences of a beauty salon, convenience store, and coffee shop.', 'We also offer online rental payment and maintenance requests.', 'You have shopped for the best and now you have found it at the all new Gates Mills Place! Visit us today and we know you will agree - it is just what you are looking for... and more!', 'Call', 'show contact info', 'today to tour our gorgeous property!', 'You do not want to miss seeing your new home!', 'We Offer Something for Everyone!', 'Indoor Pool Open Year-Round', 'Outdoor Pool with Sundeck', 'Multiple Fitness Centers', 'Party Rooms for Private Use', 'Full Service Business Centers: Computers, Internet Access, Fax and Copy Machines', 'Customer Service Centers in Each Building', 'Leasing Office', 'Beautiful Picnic Area', 'On-Site Salon and Convenience Store', 'All New Common Area Renovations Including Carpeting and Lighting', 'Lobby', 'Free Wi-Fi in Lobby Common Areas', 'Coinless Laundry Centers', 'Fully Furnished Corporate Housing Available', 'Controlled Building Access', 'Indoor Parking Available', 'Near Public Transportation', 'Close to Local Freeways: I-271, I-480, I-90', 'Walk to Banks, Shopping, Retail and Restaurants', 'Award-Winning Mayfield City Schools', 'On-Site Management', 'On-Site Maintenance', '24-Hour Emergency Maintenance', 'Online Rental Payment and Maintenance Requests', 'Preferred Employer Program and Senior Discount Available', '*Must be at least 21 years old', '*Must make 3 times the market rent before taxes', '*Must have a good credit, criminal & rental history', '**Restrictions Apply**']
